contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|beeline}} A '''bee line''' means taking the shortest route or a straight line between two points ("[[As the crow flies]]"): In transportation: * [[Bee-Line Bus System]] of Westchester County, New York, United States * [[Bee Line Buzz Company]], a former bus operator in Greater Manchester, United Kingdom * [[Bee Line Expressway]], an earlier name of Florida State Road 528 east of Orlando in the United States * [[Beeline Highway]], Arizona State Route 87 in the United States * Beeline, or Okmulgee Beeline, the section of [[U.S. Route 75#Oklahoma 2|U.S. Route 75]] from Tulsa to Okmulgee, Oklahoma, United States * [[Bee Line Railroad]], a railway in western Indiana, United States; serving Warren County and Benton County * [[Butte Regional Transit]], a public transit system in Butte County, California, United States * {{lang|de|''[[Vogelfluglinie]]''}}, the road, rail and ferry route between Hamburg (Germany) and Copenhagen (Denmark) * BEE-LINE, [[Brussels Airlines]] callsign and other meanings: * [[Beeline (beekeeping)]], a method for locating a feral bee hive * [[Beeline (telecommunications)]], a Russian telecommunications company * [[Vermilion snapper]], a species of fish * [[Beeline (album)|''Beeline'' (album)]], a 2002 album by Peter Case == See also == * [[B Line (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}} [[cs:B (linka)]] [[nl:Lijn B]]
